{{Actor| | type = Token | name = Health fillup | class = HealthFillup | game = Strife | convid = 299,281,298 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:DummyStrifeItem|DummyStrifeItem]]→HealthFillup
Automatically raises player's health to 50. Used in conversations with the Front's medic. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR HealthFillup : {{Class|DummyStrifeItem}} native { {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_HEALTHFILLUP" // "Health" }
